items.description: Global eCommerce platform for digital eSIMs, built with Next.js 15 and React 18. Integrates Shopify for catalog management and Stripe for payments, connecting with eSIM Go and eSIM Access APIs to enable international eSIM purchases in minutes.

items.title: ‚òï Caffelia
items.description: eCommerce platform for Colombian specialty coffee, developed with Medusa.js and React. Connects consumers with local coffee growers, integrating MercadoPago for payments and MiPaquete.com API for automated nationwide shipping.

items.title: ‚öΩ API Football
items.description: Modular and responsive platform designed to connect and display real-time data from sports APIs. Built with React 19, Vite, and TailwindCSS, delivering historical stats, live results, and adaptable visualizations.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a fullstack developer specializing in building scalable web applications and innovative solutions. My focus is on writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code, with a proven track record of successful projects.
about.paragraph2: I'm passionate about learning new technologies and applying best development practices. I always strive to create exceptional user experiences while maintaining code quality.
